name: Olaf
title: the Berserker
shortBio: An unstoppable force of destruction, the axe-wielding Olaf wants nothing but to die in glorious combat. Hailing from the brutal Freljordian peninsula of Lokfar, he once received a prophecy foretelling his peaceful passingâ€”a coward's fate, and a great insult among his people. Seeking death, and fueled by rage, he rampaged across the land, slaughtering scores of great warriors and legendary beasts in search of any opponent who could stop him. Now a brutal enforcer for the Winter's Claw, he seeks his end in the great wars to come.

skins.name: Glacial Olaf
skins.description: The villagers thought it was an avalanche. Then they saw the axe.

skins.name: Brolaf
skins.description: Bro. You think like, there's another version of me somewhere else not having a cold Graggy? Haha nah me neither.

skins.name: Pentakill Olaf
skins.description: Good drummers have rhythm, huge body counts, and are accursed vikings with an insatiable desire to kill. PENTAKILL's Olaf is a very, very good drummer.

skins.name: Marauder Olaf
skins.description: Marauders are the remnants of a brutal regime known as the Magelords, who conquered more than half the world at the dawn of civilization. Though their empire has long since crumbled, its remaining armies now wage endless wars, seeking death and glory wherever they may find it.

skins.name: Butcher Olaf
skins.description: He's the maestro of meat, the barbarian culinarian, the great northern butcher of the Winter's Claw. He's here for alimentary victory or literal death. Give it up for Olaf!

skins.name: SKT T1 Olaf
skins.description: Honoring Bengi's winning performance as Olaf during the 2016 World Championship. This is Bengi's third World Champion skin, following his wins with SKT at the 2013 and 2015 World Championships.

skins.name: Dragonslayer Olaf

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: A savage berserker from the hinterlands, Olaf sought a warrior's death in slaying dragons. One by one, the horrid beasts fell to his axe, and rumors even tell of him consuming the heart of a dragon he beheaded. Truth is, this act has only fanned the fire of his rage, driving him to bring about the end of dragons.

skins.name: Sentinel Olaf

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Sentinels event.

skins.description: After a vicious encounter on the Freljordian front, Olaf is convinced to join the Sentinels to satiate his hunger for battle. Only then would he have the power to challenge Viego, the greatest threat the world has ever known, and satisfy his urge to fearlessly face death in glorious combat.

skins.name: Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Olaf

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: All hail, Olaf, the Blastbeat Barbarian, and Chosen of Stentorus! As wild as a tempest, as brutal as an earthquake, he laughs in the faces of his enemies, his pounding drumbeats shaking the very foundations of the world.

skins.name: Infernal Olaf

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: As self-destructive as he is deadly, Infernal Olaf fervidly embraced the Infernal flame. Giving himself over to it, body and soul, he lives to serve the Ashen Lord and will destroy anything and everything in his path.

passive.name: Berserker Rage
passive.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed and Life Steal based on his missing Health.

spells.name: Undertow
spells.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and reducing their Armor and Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reset.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Olaf throws an axe, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage and Slowing by @SlowAmount*100@% for up to @Effect3Amount@ seconds (based on distance travelled). Champions hit lose @ShredAmount*100@% Armor for @DebuffDuration@ seconds.

If Olaf picks up the axe, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced to @TooltipCDRefund@ seconds, or fully refunded if @TooltipCDRefund@ seconds has elapsed.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Tough It Out
spells.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased and he gains a Shield.
spells.dynamicDescription: Olaf gains <attackSpeed>@Attackspeed*100@% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for @Duration@ seconds, and <shield>@BaseShield@ plus @ShieldPercMissingHP*100@% missing Health Shield (up to a maximum of @MaxShieldCalc@ Shield below @ThresholdForMax*100@% Health)</shield> for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Reckless Swing
spells.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing @TotalDamage@ true damage. If the enemy dies, the cost is refunded.

Attacks lower the Cooldown of this Ability by 1 second, increased to 2 seconds when attacking monsters.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Ragnarok
spells.description: Olaf passively gains increased armor and magic resist. He can activate this ability to become immune to disables for as long as he keeps attacking.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Olaf gains @Resists@ Armor and @Resists@ Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf cleanses all Immobilizing and Disabling effects on himself and becomes immune to them for @Duration@ seconds. While active, Olaf gains @AD@ Attack Damage. Hitting a champion with an Attack or Reckless Swing extends the duration by @DurationExtension@ seconds.

Additionally, Olaf gains @Haste*100@% Move Speed towards enemy champions for @HasteDuration@ second.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
